info.header: Nokia Siemens RNC RN60_1 WBTS_Level_Monitoring WBTSMON measurement dump
info.csv_title: Nokia Siemens RNC RN60_1 WBTS_Level_Monitoring WBTSMON measurement dump

kpi_info.title: period_duration
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: HSDPA_MAX_MACHS_THR
kpi_info.use: The maximum HSDPA MAC-hs/ehs throughput (including retransmissions) during the measurement period, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: HSDPA_AVG_MACHS_THR
kpi_info.use: Average HSDPA MAC-hs/ehs throughput (including retransmissions) that is the sum of the sampled data divided by the number of sampling periods over the measurement period. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: HSUPA_MAX_MACE_THR
kpi_info.use: The maximum HSUPA MAC-e/i throughput (including retransmissions) during the measurement period, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: HSUPA_AVG_MACE_THR
kpi_info.use: Average HSUPA MAC-e/i throughput (including retransmissions) that is the sum of the sampled data divided by the number of sampling periods over the measurement period. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MIN_USED_CE_DL_WBTS
kpi_info.use:
The minimum amount of used CE for DL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA, and - R99 CEs consumed for CCCHs.
In CCCH used resources (Flexi Rel. 2 HW), only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, and - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA.
Note: In Flexi BTS, the number of used CEs can temporarily exceed the licensed capacity when PS radio bearer bit rate is upgraded.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_USED_CE_DL_WBTS
kpi_info.use:
The average amount of used CE for DL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA, and - R99 CEs consumed for CCCHs.
In CCCH used resources (Flexi Rel. 2 HW), only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, and - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA.
Note: In Flexi BTS, the number of used CEs can temporarily exceed the licensed capacity when PS radio bearer bit rate is upgraded.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_USED_CE_DL_WBTS
kpi_info.use:
The maximum amount of used CE for DL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA, and - R99 CEs consumed for CCCHs.
In CCCH used resources (Flexi Rel. 2 HW), only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, and - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA.
Note: In Flexi BTS, the number of used CEs can temporarily exceed the licensed capacity when PS radio bearer bit rate is upgraded.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_USED_CE_UL_WBTS
kpi_info.use:
The minimum amount of used CE for UL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA, and - R99 CEs consumed for CCCHs.
In CCCH used resources (Flexi Rel. 2 HW), only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, and - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA.
Note: In Flexi BTS, the number of used CEs can temporarily exceed the licensed capacity when PS radio bearer bit rate is upgraded.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_USED_CE_UL_WBTS
kpi_info.use:
The average amount of used CE for UL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA, and - R99 CEs consumed for CCCHs.
In CCCH used resources (Flexi Rel. 2 HW), only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, and - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA.
Note: In Flexi BTS, the number of used CEs can temporarily exceed the licensed capacity when PS radio bearer bit rate is upgraded.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_USED_CE_UL_WBTS
kpi_info.use:
The maximum amount of used CE for UL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA, and - R99 CEs consumed for CCCHs.
In CCCH used resources (Flexi Rel. 2 HW), only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter includes: - R99 CEs, - hybrid HSUPA resource steps used by R99 users, and - dynamic HSUPA resource steps that are allocated for HSUPA.
Note: In Flexi BTS, the number of used CEs can temporarily exceed the licensed capacity when PS radio bearer bit rate is upgraded.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_USED_CE_R99_DL
kpi_info.use:
The minimum amount of CE used for R99 users in DL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter calculates all DCH and CCCH used resources.
In CCCH, only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter calculates all DCH used resources.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_USED_CE_R99_DL
kpi_info.use:
The average amount of CE used for R99 users in DL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter calculates all DCH and CCCH used resources.
In CCCH, only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter calculates all DCH used resources.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_USED_CE_R99_DL
kpi_info.use:
The maximum amount of CE used for R99 users in DL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter calculates all DCH and CCCH used resources.
In CCCH, only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter calculates all DCH used resources.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_USED_CE_R99_UL
kpi_info.use:
The minimum amount of CE used for R99 users in UL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter calculates all DCH and CCCH used resources.
In CCCH, only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter calculates all DCH used resources.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_USED_CE_R99_UL
kpi_info.use:
The average amount of CE used for R99 users in UL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter calculates all DCH and CCCH used resources.
In CCCH, only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter calculates all DCH used resources.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_USED_CE_R99_UL
kpi_info.use:
The maximum amount of CE used for R99 users in UL direction, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
In Flexi Rel. 2 HW, the counter calculates all DCH and CCCH used resources.
In CCCH, only CEs used for additional CCCHs are calculated (CCCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in this counter).
In Flexi Rel. 3 HW and mixed Flexi BTSs (Flexi Rel. 3 HW + Flexi Rel. 2 HW), the counter calculates all DCH used resources.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_BTS_HSUPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of HSUPA users, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_BTS_HSUPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The average number of HSUPA users, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples in the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MAX_BTS_HSUPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of HSUPA users, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_BTS_HSDPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of HSDPA users, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_BTS_HSDPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The average number of HSDPA users, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples in the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MAX_BTS_HSDPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of HSDPA users, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_HSDPA_PS_UTIL_RAT
kpi_info.use:
The minimum HSDPA processing sets utilization ratio calculated as percentage of the used PS from the licensed PS, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Retransmissions are included.
Processing set utilization ratio is based on two conditions: 1) throughput utilization and 2) number of users.
For the purpose of this counter, in each sample, both conditions need to be calculated. The bigger percentage should be used.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_HSDPA_PS_UTIL_RAT
kpi_info.use:
The average HSDPA processing sets utilization ratio calculated as percentage of the used PS from the licensed PS, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Retransmissions are included.
Processing set utilization ratio is based on two conditions: 1) throughput utilization and 2) number of users.
For the purpose of this counter, in each sample, both conditions need to be calculated. The bigger percentage should be used.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_HSDPA_PS_UTIL_RAT
kpi_info.use:
The maximum HSDPA processing sets utilization ratio calculated as percentage of the used PS from the licensed PS, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Retransmissions are included.
Processing set utilization ratio is based on two conditions: 1) throughput utilization and 2) number of users.
For the purpose of this counter, in each sample, both conditions need to be calculated. The bigger percentage should be used.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_HSUPA_PS_UTIL_RAT
kpi_info.use: The minimum HSUPA Processing Sets Utilization ratio calculated as percentage of the used PS from the Licensed PS, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period. Processing Set Utilization ratio is based on three conditions: throughput utilization, number of users and HW utilization for HSUPA. For the purpose of this counter in each sample period all conditions are calculated and the one with bigger percentage value is used. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_HSUPA_PS_UTIL_RAT
kpi_info.use: The average HSUPA Processing Sets Utilization ratio over the whole measurement period duration, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period, summing all the samples, and dividing by the number of samples during measurement period. Processing Set Utilization ratio is based on three conditions: 1) throughput utilization, 2) number of users, and 3) HW utilization for HSUPA. For the purpose of this counter, in each sample period, all conditions are calculated. The one with bigger percentage value is used. Note: In case of Flexi Rel1 HW, this counter is not produced at all. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_HSUPA_PS_UTIL_RAT
kpi_info.use:
The maximum HSUPA processing sets utilization ratio calculated as percentage of the used PS from the licensed PS, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during measurement period.
Processing set utilization ratio is based on three conditions: 1) throughput utilization, 2) number of users, and 3) HW utilization for HSUPA.
For the purpose of this counter, in each sample period, all conditions are calculated. The biggest percentage value is used.UPDATED:The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: LIC_HW_CAP_UTIL_RAT
kpi_info.use:
The percentage of BTS hardware capacity utilization calculated as the licensed capacity (HSUPA + HSDPA + R99 CE licensed capacity) related to the hardware capacity available for licensing during measurement period.
Note: CCCH capacity included in HW price, PIC and HS-FACH resources are not included in the subunits amount available for licensing.UPDATED:The counter is updated when the HW or the licensed capacity changes in the BTS.

kpi_info.title: LIC_HSDPA_THR
kpi_info.use: The maximum available licensed HSDPA BTS level throughput.UPDATED:The counter is updated when HSDPA licensed capacity changes.

kpi_info.title: LIC_HSUPA_THR
kpi_info.use: The maximum available licensed HSUPA BTS level throughput.UPDATED:The counter is updated when HSUPA licensed capacity changes.

kpi_info.title: LIC_NUM_HSDPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The number of available licensed HSDPA users.UPDATED:The counter is updated when HSDPA licensed capacity changes.

kpi_info.title: LIC_NUM_HSUPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: The number of available licensed HSUPA users.UPDATED:The counter is updated when HSUPA licensed capacity changes.

kpi_info.title: MIN_HSUPA_SU_USG
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of subunits used for HSUPA, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period for the measurement period duration UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_HSUPA_SU_USG
kpi_info.use: The average number of subunits used for HSUPA over the whole measurement period duration, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period, summing all the samples and dividing by the number of samples for the measurement period duration UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_HSUPA_SU_USG
kpi_info.use:
The maximum number of subunits used for HSUPA, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
Note: Counter unit is the smallest subunit in the BTS.
Note: The counter does not contain PIC pool resources.UPDATED:The counter is updated during the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_HSUPA_SU_USG
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of subunits used for HSUPA, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period for the measurement period duration UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_HSUPA_SU_USG
kpi_info.use: The average number of subunits used for HSUPA over the whole measurement period duration, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period, summing all the samples and dividing by the number of samples for the measurement period duration UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MAX_HSUPA_SU_USG
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of subunits used for HSUPA, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period for the measurement period duration UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: MIN_USED_BB_SUBUNITS
kpi_info.use: The sample with the minimum number of used baseband subunits, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period for the measurement period duration. Note: This counter is valid only for Flexi Rel2. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the minimum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: AVG_USED_BB_SUBUNITS
kpi_info.use: The average number of used baseband subunits over the whole measurement period duration, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period, summing all the samples and dividing by the number of samples for the measurement period duration. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the average value of all samples.Note: This counter is valid only for Flexi Rel2.

kpi_info.title: MAX_USED_BB_SUBUNITS
kpi_info.use:
The sample with the maximum number of used baseband subunits. This is obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period.
Note: Counter unit is the smallest subunit in the BTS.
Note: The counter does not contain free CCCH resources included in HW price.UPDATED:The counter is updated during the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi_info.title: NUM_BB_SUBUNITS
kpi_info.use:
The BTS level baseband HW capacity expressed in subunits.
Note: Counter unit is the smallest subunit in the BTS.
Note: The counter does not contain free CCCH resources included in HW price.UPDATED:The counter is updated when BTS HW capacity is changed.

kpi_info.title: CONF_HSDPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: Number of configured (commissioned) HSDPA users. UPDATED: The counter is updated when the configuration (commissioning) of the number of HSDPA users is changed, or when the licensing of the number of HSDPA users is changed.

kpi_info.title: CONF_HSUPA_USERS
kpi_info.use: Number of configured (commissioned) HSUPA users. UPDATED: The counter is updated when the configuration (commissioning) of the number of HSUPA users is changed, or when the licensing of the number of HSUPA users is changed.

kpi_info.title: CONF_HSDPA_THR
kpi_info.use: The configured (commissioned) HSDPA BTS level throughput. UPDATED: The counter is updated when HSPA throughput configuration (commissioning) is changed.

kpi_info.title: CONF_HSUPA_THR
kpi_info.use: The configured (commissioned) HSUPA BTS level throughput. UPDATED: The counter is updated when HSPA throughput configuration (commissioning) is changed.

kpi_info.title: USED_CCCH_PS_WBTS
kpi_info.use: "The used number of CCCH PS during the measurement period. This counter is generated only for BTSs having Rel3 FSM.Updated: The counter is updated when the used number of CCCH PS changes (cell setup, deletion or reallocation)."

kpi_info.title: CONFIGURED_CCCH_PS_WBTS
kpi_info.use: "The number of configured CCCH PS during the measurement period. This counter is generated only for BTSs having Rel3 FSM.Updated: The counter is updated when the configured number of CCCH PS changes (BTSOM informs TCOM about change in commissioning parameter numberOfCcchSet)."

kpi_info.title: LICENSED_CCCH_PS_WBTS
kpi_info.use: "The number of licensed CCCH PS during the measurement period. This counter is generated only for BTSs having Rel3 FSM.Updated: The counter is updated when the licensed number of CCCH PS changes (BTSOM informs TCOM about changed number of CCCH processing set licenses existing in BTS)."
